main event: A UFO was observed 30 miles west of Lovelock, Nevada for 10-15 seconds on December 3, 1947.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 12:25 PST., The altitude of the object was between 1200 and 13000 feet., The report originated from a civilian source., No maneuvers were noted during the observation., The report does not contain any photographs or sketches.
